name: blanket co.
description: When your town gets notice that a massive winter storm is coming, they realize that they are anything but prepared. Obviously, they turn to their local blanket shop to stay warm during the frigid days ahead of them. How is the shop's owner going to be able to fulfil these orders? Well, that's up to you. Play as a blanket seller/designer in this cozy game, and help to design blankets fit to your neighbors needs. If you're lucky, they'll leave a good review. Will you be able to protect your town from the snow? Hmmm... I'm not sure.
